Common wheat diseases:

тАв Blast - White spots with dark borders
тАв Powdery Mildew - White powdery coating

тАв Yellowing leaves
тАв Brown spots
тАв Wilting
тАв Stunted growth

тАв Brown spots
тАв Wilting
тАв Stunted growth
